trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ModelPropertyEntry" name="ModelPropertyEntry" href=""></xref> to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ModelItem" name="ModelItem" href=""></xref> that owns the property.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref uid="langword_csharp_ModelPropertyEntry" name="ModelPropertyEntry" href=""></xref>至<xref uid="langword_csharp_ModelItem" name="ModelItem" href=""></xref>擁有此屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Converters.ModelPropertyEntryToOwnerActivityConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Converters.ModelPropertyEntryToOwnerActivityConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ModelPropertyEntry" name="ModelPropertyEntry" href=""></xref> to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ModelItem" name="ModelItem" href=""></xref> that owns the property.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref uid="langword_csharp_ModelPropertyEntry" name="ModelPropertyEntry" href=""></xref>至<xref uid="langword_csharp_ModelItem" name="ModelItem" href=""></xref>擁有此屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value that is produced by the binding target.
You can pass a Boolean value in.
By default, this converter will always return the parent model item that is of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_Activity" name="Activity" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個轉換子就一定會傳回父模型項目型別的<xref uid="langword_csharp_Activity" name="Activity" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> is passed to this method, the converter will simply return the first parent model item, which might not be a model item that points to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Activity" name="Activity" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>會傳遞至這個方法，轉換只會傳回第一個父代模型項目，這可能不是模型項目指向<xref uid="langword_csharp_Activity" name="Activity" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in the converter.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換程式中使用的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is not supported.
The value that is produced by the binding target.
The culture to use in the converter.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換程式中使用的文化特性。
